about_the_game:
This product is a demo of "Slimg".

The demo allows you to experience part of the early content of the game.

In the full version, both the explorable areas and the protagonist's abilities will be expanded.

"Slimg" is a Metroidvania game

The Slimg, who was being pursued by space pirates, was forced to land on a mysterious planet. In order to be able to leave this planet, the Slime Dog began an adventure on it.

Exploration

The planet SR400 has four completely different areas. In the trial version, you can fully explore the game's beginner area: Sdog Village.

Sdog Village: The creatures in Sdog Village are crazy about pumpkins. There is also a mysterious power in the village that enables other creatures to freely grow larger or smaller.

Unique and challenging platform gameplay:

The village of sdog features two challenging platform gameplay elements.

Mushroom Platform:

Bubble Platform:

(full edition)Non-linear levels, more areas to explore:

In order to escape from the planet SR400, Slimg had no choice but to venture into even more perilous areas such as volcanoes, underground tunnels and ice fields to search for the key to the mysterious spaceship.

(full edition)Multiple endings:

Search for more information about the mysterious spaceship in the rainforest and find the true owner of the mysterious spaceship on the planet.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 GHz+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 Series or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
